sectiondef.header: Special Commands of the Proxy Filter, Heartbeat and other

description.para: The following is the list of the special commands of the Proxy Filter, Heartbeat and other that came from Network and Transport layers into wiced_bt_mesh_core_received_msg_handler_t.

briefdescription.para: Opcodes of the Proxy Configuration Messages.

detaileddescription.para: Sent by a Proxy Client to set the proxy filter type.

briefdescription.para: Sent by a Proxy Client to add addresses to the proxy filter list.
Sent by a Proxy Client to remove addresses from the proxy filter list.
Acknowledgment by a Proxy Server to a Proxy Client to report the status of the proxy filter list.
Sent by a Directed Proxy Server to report the status of its capabilities for a subnet.
Sent by a Directed Proxy Client to set connection parameters of the Directed Proxy for a subnet.
Heartbeat message came from Transport layer.

description.para: The following is the list of signals used for certification and compliance testing.

briefdescription.para: the node shall transition to the IV Update in Progress state, ignoring the 96 hour limit.
the node shall transition to the Normal state, ignoring the 96 hour limit.
test signal for internal use.

description.para: The following is the list of Provisioning Result codes that a provisioning layer can return in wiced_bt_mesh_provision_end_cb_t().

briefdescription.para: Provisioning succeeded.
Provisioning failed due to timeout.
Provisioning failed.
Blink.
Beep.
Vibrate.
Output Numeric.
Output Alphanumeric.
Max number of supported actions.
Push.
Twist.
Input Number.
Input Alphanumeric.
Max number of supported actions.

description.para: The following is the list of Provisioning in/out action codes and max sizes are the same for both capabilities and start messages.

The following is the list of the definitions for start message.
The following is the list of the definitions for provisioning type.

briefdescription.para: Provisioner: OOB not used.
Provisioner: Enter public key()
Provisioner: Enter output OOB value(size, action) displayed on provisioning node.
Provisioner: Enter static OOB value(size)
Provisioning node: Enter input OOB value(size, action) displayed on provisioner.
Provisioner: Select and display input OOB value(size, action)
Provisioning node: Select and display output OOB value(size, action)
Provisioner and Provisioning node: Stop displaying OOB value.
Provisioning node: Requests static OOB value(size)

sectiondef.header: Status codes for the Provisioning Record Response PDU

briefdescription.para: Size of the private key in bytes.
Size of the mesh keys.
Own SEQ or RPL SEQ is changed.
Default TTL is changed.
Network Transmit is changed.
Net Key is added.
Net Key is deleted.
Net Key is updated.
App Key is added.
App Key is deleted.
App Key is updated.
App is Bound.
App is UnBound.
IV Index or/and IV UPDATE update flag is changed is changed.
KR phase is changed to 2 (WICED_TRUE) or to 9(WICED_FALSE)
Node state is changed.

detaileddescription.para: Called on Node Reset and successfull Provisioning. App should change GATT DB

briefdescription.para: LPN friendship state is changed - established or aborted.
LPN application can go to sleep mode for a specific sleep time or can return with same or changed sleep time to let core to procceed with poll after that time.
LPN layer requests stop(or start) scanning when it doesn't expect(or expects) any packets.
Friend friendship state is changed - established or aborted.
RPL is cleared.
Private beacon received.
Proxy service advertisement received.

memberdef.definition: typedef wiced_bool_t(* wiced_bt_mesh_core_received_msg_handler_t) (wiced_bt_mesh_event_t *p_event, const uint8_t *params, uint16_t params_len)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_received_msg_handler_t

briefdescription.para: Received message callback.

detaileddescription.para: Each model implements that function to handle received messages.

parameterdescription.para: Parameters related to received message. It should be released by call to wiced_bt_mesh_release_event() or it can be used to send reply by call to wiced_bt_mesh_core_send()
Application Parameters - extracted from the Access Payload
Length of the Application Parameters

simplesect.para: WICED_TRUE if message handled and handler took ownership of the p_event. Otherwise returns WICED_FALSE - then caller keeps ownership of p_event.

memberdef.definition: typedef wiced_bt_mesh_core_received_msg_handler_t(* wiced_bt_mesh_core_get_msg_handler_callback_t) (uint16_t company_id, uint16_t opcode, uint16_t *p_model_id, uint8_t *p_rpl_flag)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_get_msg_handler_callback_t

briefdescription.para: Get message handler callback.

detaileddescription.para: The AIROC Mesh Application library implements that function to find and return the message handler corresponding to the opcode of received message. If opcode does not correspond to any supported model then the function returns NULL. Otherwise it returns the message handler.
The 0xffff value of the comany_id means special case when message came from Network or Transport layer (see Special Commands of the Proxy Filter, Heartbeat and other).

parameterdescription.para: Opcode company ID
Opcode
Variable for found Model ID for that opcode
It can be any of RPL_STATUS_XXX defined in the wiced_bt_mesh_event.h. Model indicates how SEQ shall be saved by the core.

simplesect.para: Message handler of the model for that opcode. If model isn't found then returns NULL.

memberdef.definition: typedef wiced_bool_t(* wiced_bt_mesh_core_publication_callback_t) (uint8_t elem_idx, uint16_t company_id, uint16_t model_id, uint16_t period)
memberdef.argsstring: )(uint8_t elem_idx, uint16_t company_id, uint16_t model_id, uint16_t period)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_publication_callback_t

briefdescription.para: Publication request callback.

detaileddescription.para: The AIROC Mesh Application library implements that function to be notified when periodic publication configuration has changed or when a model need to publish its status. If period is set to 0, the publication needs to stop. Period between 1 and 0xFFFE indicates that Periodic Publication for the specified model is being changed. Value 0xFFFF indicates that the value needs to be published now.

parameterdescription.para: Element index
Company ID
Model ID
New value of the publication period in 100 ms units or indication that model has to publish status now.

simplesect.para: When core calls application to setup publication period, return WICED_TRUE indicates, that application will take care of the periodic publication. WICED_FALSE means that core shall take care of periodic publications and execute callback every period seconds.

memberdef.definition: typedef uint32_t(* wiced_bt_core_nvram_access_t) (wiced_bool_t write, int inx, uint8_t *node_info, uint16_t len, wiced_result_t *p_result)
memberdef.argsstring: )(wiced_bool_t write, int inx, uint8_t *node_info, uint16_t len, wiced_result_t *p_result)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_core_nvram_access_t

briefdescription.para: Application provided function to read/write information from/to NVRAM.

detaileddescription.para: Application should provide the address of this callback function that the core library can execute to store or retrieve a memory chunk from the NVRAM.

parameterdescription.para: WICED_TRUE - write; WICED_FALSE - read.
Index of the memory chunk to read/write
Buffer to read/write from/to.
The size of memory chunk to read/write. Write 0 means delete.
Pointer to variable to receive the result of operation.

simplesect.para: Return the number of bytes red/written from/into NVRAM

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* wiced_bt_mesh_core_scan_callback_t) (wiced_bool_t start, wiced_bool_t is_scan_type_active)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_scan_callback_t

briefdescription.para: Start/Stop scan callback.

detaileddescription.para: Application implements that function if it can provide service to start/stop scan.

parameterdescription.para: Call will set this to WICED_TRUE to start the scan, WICED_FALSE to stop the scan
WICED_TRUE - Active Scan; WICED_FALSE - Passive Scan.

The reference data that was passed to the core when connection was established
Packet to send

memberdef.definition: typedef uint8_t(* wiced_bt_mesh_core_health_fault_test_cb_t) (uint8_t element, uint8_t test_id, uint16_t company_id, uint8_t fault_array_size, uint8_t *fault_array)
memberdef.argsstring: )(uint8_t element, uint8_t test_id, uint16_t company_id, uint8_t fault_array_size, uint8_t *fault_array)

briefdescription.para: Definition of the callback function to send proxy packet.

detaileddescription.para: The application shall implement this function to support Health Server Model. The function is called by the Mesh Core library to get Current Fault.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the element
Identifier of a specific test to be performed
Company ID of the test
Size of the buffer fault_array
Buffer to receive FaultArray

simplesect.para: number of error codes filled into fault_array. Value 0xff means invalid test_id.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* wiced_bt_mesh_core_attention_cb_t) (uint8_t element, uint8_t time)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_attention_cb_t

briefdescription.para: Definition of the callback function to attract human attention by LED blinks or other.

detaileddescription.para: The application shall implement this function to support Health Server Model. The function is executed by the Mesh Core library to attract human attention.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the element.
0 - Off; 0x01-0xff - On, remaining time in seconds.

memberdef.definition: typedef wiced_bool_t(* wiced_bt_mesh_core_adv_send_cb_t) (uint8_t instance, uint8_t transmissions, uint32_t interval, uint8_t type, uint8_t *own_bd_addr, const uint8_t *adv_data, uint8_t adv_data_len, const uint8_t *scan_rsp_data, uint8_t scan_rsp_data_len)
memberdef.argsstring: )(uint8_t instance, uint8_t transmissions, uint32_t interval, uint8_t type, uint8_t *own_bd_addr, const uint8_t *adv_data, uint8_t adv_data_len, const uint8_t *scan_rsp_data, uint8_t scan_rsp_data_len)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_adv_send_cb_t

briefdescription.para: Definition of the callback function to send advert messages or stop sending it or reset all adverts.

detaileddescription.para: Application implements that function. 0 instance means reset all adverts - then all other params should be ignored. 0 transmissions means stop specific instance then all other params except instance should be ignored.

parameterdescription.para: Adv instance to send or stop. 0 instance means reset all adverts - then all other params should be ignored.
Number of transmissions. 0 means stop adv with that instance
Adv interval
Adv type - see wiced_bt_ble_multi_advert_type_e in wiced_bt_ble.h @oaram[in] own_bd_addr Own LE address
Advertisement data to send
Length of the advertisement data to send
Scan response data to send
Length of the scan response data to send

simplesect.para: WICED_TRUE on success; WICED_FALSE on error

briefdescription.para: Fills a given array with randomly generated 32-bit integers.

parameterdescription.para: The pointer to an array to be populated with random numbers.
The length of the array pointed to by randNumberArrayPtr.

briefdescription.para: This functin returns a pseudo random number.
Generates and returns a random 32-bit integer.

detaileddescription.para: Internal functions check that the generating hardware is warmed up and ready before returning the random value. If the hardware is too "cold" at the time of use, the function will instead use the BT clock as a "seed" and generate a "soft" random number.

briefdescription.para: Execute a soft reset of the system.
deletes data from NVRAM at specified VS id

parameterdescription.para: : Volatile Section Identifier. Application can use the VS ids from WICED_NVRAM_VSID_START to WICED_NVRAM_VSID_END
: Pointer to location where status of the call is returned

memberdef.definition: typedef uint16_t(* wiced_bt_mesh_core_hal_write_nvram_t) (uint16_t vs_id, uint16_t data_length, uint8_t *p_data, wiced_result_t *p_status)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_hal_write_nvram_t

briefdescription.para: Writes the data to NVRAM, Application can write up to 255 bytes in one VS id section.

parameterdescription.para: : Volatile Section Identifier. Application can use the VS ids from WICED_NVRAM_VSID_START to WICED_NVRAM_VSID_END
: Length of the data to be written to the NVRAM,
: Pointer to the data to be written to the NVRAM
: Pointer to location where status of the call is returned

simplesect.para: number of bytes written, 0 on error

memberdef.definition: typedef uint16_t(* wiced_bt_mesh_core_hal_read_nvram_t) (uint16_t vs_id, uint16_t data_length, uint8_t *p_data, wiced_result_t *p_status)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_hal_read_nvram_t

briefdescription.para: Reads the data from NVRAM.

parameterdescription.para: : Volatile Section Identifier. Application can use the VS ids from WICED_NVRAM_VSID_START to WICED_NVRAM_VSID_END
: Length of the data to be read from NVRAM
: Pointer to the buffer to which data will be copied
: Pointer to location where status of the call is returned

simplesect.para: the number of bytes read, 0 on failure

briefdescription.para: Calculate AES encryption by using Hardware acceleration.

parameterdescription.para: : point to input data buffer
out_data : point to output data buffer
: point to key data buffer

briefdescription.para: Send message complete callback.

detaileddescription.para: While sending message to the core for transmission over the mesh, the application may provide this function to be notified when the operation has been completed. The Mesh Core library passes the pointer to the same event which was included in the send call. When callback is executed the application should take the ownership of the mesh event and shell release or reuse it.

parameterdescription.para: Mesh event passed to wiced_bt_mesh_core_send()

briefdescription.para: Provisioning Record Request PDU parameters format.
Provisioning Record Response PDU parameters format.

memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_provision_gatt_send_cb_t

briefdescription.para: Definition of the callback function to send provisioning packet.

detaileddescription.para: Application implements that function if it want to use GATT notification or even external function (for example Windows provisioner). Called by provisioning layer to send packet to the provisioner or provisioning node.

parameterdescription.para: GATT connection ID
Packet to send
Length of the packet to send

briefdescription.para: Definition of the callback function on Starts provisioning.

detaileddescription.para: Provisioner or/and provisioning application implements that function to be called on successful start of provisioning.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID of the provisioning connection

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* wiced_bt_mesh_core_provision_end_cb_t) (uint32_t conn_id, uint16_t addr, uint16_t net_key_idx, uint8_t result, const uint8_t *p_dev_key)
memberdef.argsstring: )(uint32_t conn_id, uint16_t addr, uint16_t net_key_idx, uint8_t result, const uint8_t *p_dev_key)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_provision_end_cb_t

briefdescription.para: Definition of the callback function on provisioning end.

detaileddescription.para: Provisioner or/and provisioning application implements that function to be called on successfull or failed end of provisioning.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID of the provisioning connection
Address assigned to the first element of the device
Net Key Index configured to the device
Provisioning Result code (see Provisioning Result codes)

Pointer to the Device Key generated during provisioning. It is valid only if result is SUCCESS(0). On provisioner side that pointer becomes invalid after return. On provisioning node side it can be use at any time.

memberdef.definition: typedef wiced_bool_t(* wiced_bt_mesh_core_provision_get_oob_cb_t) (uint32_t conn_id, uint8_t type, uint8_t size, uint8_t action)
memberdef.argsstring: )(uint32_t conn_id, uint8_t type, uint8_t size, uint8_t action)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_provision_get_oob_cb_t

briefdescription.para: Definition of the callback function on get OOB.

detaileddescription.para: Provisioner application implements that function to be called on get OOB if it supposed to enter public key, output OOB, or static OOB or display input OOB. Provisioning application implements that function to be called on get OOB if it supposed to enter input OOB or display output OOB App should call wiced_bt_mesh_provision_set_oob() to proceed. Provisioner layer calls that function to request app to enter requested value and call pb_put_oob with entered value.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID of the provisioning connection
OOB type requested (see OOB callback definitions)
Ignored for PUB_KEY, size for STATIC, INPUT and OUTPUT, ignored for DISPLAY_STOP (see spec for possible values)
Ignored for PUB_KEY and STATIC, action for INPUT and OUTPUT, ignored for DISPLAY_STOP(see spec for possible values)

briefdescription.para: Definition of the callback function on Capabilities.

detaileddescription.para: Provisioner application implements that function to be called on receiving the capabilities of provisioning node. App should call wiced_bt_mesh_provision_set_mode() to proceed.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID of the provisioning connection
Capabilities received from provisioning node

briefdescription.para: Definition of the callback function on get Capabilities.

detaileddescription.para: Provisioning application implements that function to be called by provisioning layer to get capabilities of provisioning node from the app. App should call wiced_bt_mesh_core_provision_set_capabilities() to proceed

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID of the provisioning connection

briefdescription.para: Definition of the callback function on get provisioning records list.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to save list of provisioning records IDs

simplesect.para: Number of the provisioning records IDs in the list.

briefdescription.para: Definition of the callback function on get fragment of the provisioning record.

parameterdescription.para: - record designated tag
- pointer to the memory buffer to store the record
- number of bytes to read
- start offset to read the record
- pointer to the output parameter to store total record size

simplesect.para: uint16_t - number of bytes that was actually read to the buffer

briefdescription.para: Device Key request callback.

detaileddescription.para: Client application implements that function to handle core requests for device key of the peer device. It is needed if app wants to send/receive configuration messages.

parameterdescription.para: Address of the node which device key is requested.
Network Key Index to use for message encryption. It can be NULL. Returned value 0xffff means use primary net key.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the device key. On error returns NULL.

briefdescription.para: Callback function to receive LPN sleep event.

detaileddescription.para: BLOB transfer server implement this callback to send message before LPN goes to sleep.

parameterdescription.para: Change LPN sleep time if necessary

briefdescription.para: CTL field.

detaileddescription.para: can be 0 or 1

briefdescription.para: TTL field.

detaileddescription.para: can be between 0 and 0x7f

briefdescription.para: Destination address (LE)

detaileddescription.para: BigEndian 2 bytes destination address or 16 bytes label UUID of the virtual address.

briefdescription.para: TransportPDU set to between 1 and 16 inclusive octets of data.

detaileddescription.para: Access PDU.
AccessPDU set to between 1 and 380 inclusive octets of data.

briefdescription.para: Length of the destination address.

detaileddescription.para: It can be 2 or 16 for virtual address

briefdescription.para: 0 - 4 bytes TransMIC size, 1 - 8 bytes TransMIC size
1 - Transit to IV Update in Progress; 0 - Transit to Normal
connection id for provisioning.

detaileddescription.para: Better to use some random value.

briefdescription.para: unicast address to assign to provisioning node

detaileddescription.para: Subscription address (LE)

briefdescription.para: UUID of the node to provision.
identify duration to pass to that provision start command
Test ID of the faults array.
Company ID.
faults array.

detaileddescription.para: can be empty or contain up to 16 fault codes

briefdescription.para: Global Index of the Application Key (LE).

detaileddescription.para: 0xffff - device Key

briefdescription.para: Source address (LE)
WICED_TRUE/WICED_FALSE - add/remove.
Bitmask indicating the provisioning extensions supported by the device.
Lists the Record IDs of the provisioning records stored on the device.
sizes of the record data in the list
Identifies the provisioning record for which the request is made.

detaileddescription.para: Identifies the provisioning record whose data fragment is sent in the response.

briefdescription.para: The starting offset of the requested fragment in the provisioning record data.

detaileddescription.para: The starting offset of the data fragment in the provisioning record data.

briefdescription.para: The maximum size of the provisioning record fragment that the provisioner can receive.
Total length of the provisioning record data stored on the device.
Indicates whether or not the request was handled successfully.
Provisioning record data fragment (Optional)
Size of valid data in the record fragment.
If the value of that variable is WICED_TRUE then the transport layer always use 32-bit TransMIC.

detaileddescription.para: Otherwise the transport layer uses 64-bit TransMIC for segmented access messages if it fits into max transport PDU.

briefdescription.para: WICED_TRUE value activates IV Update test mode - only removes the 96-hour limit; all other behavior of the device is unchanged.

detaileddescription.para: HCI_CONTROL_MESH_COMMAND_CORE_SET_IV_UPDATE_TEST_MODE sets it to TRUE Default value is WICED_FALSE.

briefdescription.para: On WICED_TRUE CPU is boost for cpypto operations Default value is WICED_TRUE.
Advertising interval of the unprovisioned beacon in units 0.5 sec.

detaileddescription.para: Default value: 8000 (5 sec)

briefdescription.para: Advertising interval in MS of the provisioning service in units 0.5 sec.

detaileddescription.para: Default value: 800 (0.5 sec)

briefdescription.para: Advertising interval in MS of the provisioning URL in units 0.5 sec.

detaileddescription.para: Default value: 8000 (5 sec)

briefdescription.para: Minimum and maximum delay in milliseconds of the message being relayed.

detaileddescription.para: Default values: 0, 10

briefdescription.para: Minimum and maximum delay in milliseconds of the answer on the message with unicast DST.

detaileddescription.para: Default values: 20, 50

briefdescription.para: Minimum and maximum delay in milliseconds of the answer on the message with group DST.

detaileddescription.para: Default values: 20, 500

briefdescription.para: Lower Transport Layer ACK timeout.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is 250 Per spec ACK_TIMEOUT should be >= 150 + 50 * TTL. But we use hardcoded value to get rid of long ACK_TIMOUT for big TTL.

briefdescription.para: Proxy service adv interval: * 0.625 ms.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is 800 - 500 ms

briefdescription.para: Report core events from a node for test purpose.
Sets hal api.

detaileddescription.para: Application has to implement all these functions and call wiced_bt_mesh_core_set_hal_api() at the startup.

parameterdescription.para: to hal api

briefdescription.para: Returns hal api.
Mesh Core initialization.

detaileddescription.para: The wiced_bt_mesh_core_init function should be called at device startup before calling wiced_bt_mesh_core_register() for each supported model. The function should be called just once with non-NULL p_init and non-NULL p_init->p_config_data at the startup time before calling mesh_app_init. Call this function with NULL p_init or with NULL p_init->p_config_data to reset device into unprovisioned state. In that mode if p_init isn't NULL then following members should contain new values: device_uuid, non_provisioned_bda and provisioned_bda.

parameterdescription.para: Initialization parameters

simplesect.para: wiced_result_t WICED_BT_SUCCESS means device provisioned, WICED_BT_PENDING - it is not provisioned, otherwise it is not functional.

briefdescription.para: Advertisement stopped notification.

detaileddescription.para: Application calls it when requested number of transmissions of the advertisement has been sent and it stopped.

parameterdescription.para: Instance of the stopped advertisement

briefdescription.para: Set max number of advertisement instances.

detaileddescription.para: Application calls it before first advertisement start. It can be called after first advertisement start because that number is always >= 1.

parameterdescription.para: Mmax number of advertisement instances

briefdescription.para: Mesh Core de-initialization.

detaileddescription.para: The wiced_bt_mesh_core_deinit function can be called to reset device to unprovisioned state. The function deletes main nvram item and restarts device.

parameterdescription.para: Callback function to read/write from/to NVRAM

simplesect.para: On FALSE caller shall reboot the node via wiced_hal_wdog_reset_system()

briefdescription.para: Mesh Core Start.

detaileddescription.para: The wiced_bt_mesh_core_start function should be called at device startup after calling wiced_bt_mesh_core_init(). The function starts beacons and service advertisements. It is usually called by application from mesh_app_init().

briefdescription.para: Sets GATT MTU for the provisioning or proxy connection.

detaileddescription.para: Called by the app to set max sending packet length in the core and provisioning layer.

parameterdescription.para: Maximum size of the packet to be used over GATT. 0 means default value (20).

briefdescription.para: Gets local mesh address set by provisioner.
Sends the message to the dst address.

detaileddescription.para: This function encrypts and authenticates the application payload and then passes it to transport layer and then to the network layer for sending out. If the function is used for sending the response to the received message then it should use app_key_idx and SRC of the received message and default TTL. If the function is used for sending unsolicited message and application does not know the destination address, the publication information for the models should be used.

If the complete_callback is set to NULL the Core library will release the mesh event when it is done processing of the event. Otherwise the Core library will call complete_callback at the end of retransmission. At that time the caller takes ownership of the mesh event and shall reuse it or release.

parameterdescription.para: All details of the message to be sent
Parameters of the Access Payload
Length of the Parameters of the Access Payload
Callback function to be called at the end of all retransmissions. Can be NULL.

briefdescription.para: Stop sending retransmissions.

detaileddescription.para: Mesh Core library when sending mesh packets over the advertising channel typically retransmits every packet several times to improve reliability of the delivery. When it is a client request (for example a Get or a Set message), the peer may receive the earlier transmission and reply to it. When a Model library receives the reply, and detects that there is no need to retransmit the packet, it can call the wiced_bt_mesh_core_cancel_send function to cancel the retransmission of the packet.

parameterdescription.para: Mesh event used to send message by wiced_bt_mesh_core_send() for which retransitions should be stoped.

briefdescription.para: Handles received advertising packet.

detaileddescription.para: The Mesh Application library calls this function for each received advertisement packet.

parameterdescription.para: RSSI of the received packet
Advertisement packet data
BD address of the node that advertisement packet data came from

briefdescription.para: Handle packet received by proxy via GATT.

detaileddescription.para: Application should call that function on each received packet from the GATT data in characteristic of the proxy service.

parameterdescription.para: Received packet
Length of the received packet.

briefdescription.para: Get Network Key Index.

detaileddescription.para: Application can call this function to verify that Network ID is provisioned on the device.

parameterdescription.para: :Network ID in question
:Valid Natwork Key Index

simplesect.para: WICED_TRUE if the Network ID is known, otherwise WICED_FALSE.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint32_t conn_id, wiced_bool_t connected_to_proxy, uint32_t ref_data, uint16_t mtu)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_connection_status

briefdescription.para: Handles connection up and down events.

detaileddescription.para: Application should call that function on each connection up and down state. Only one connection is alowed.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID if connected. 0 if disconnected
If TRUE, core will send all the messages to this connection. Otherwise core will send packet to all bearers.
Core passes this parameter back to the application when packet needs to be sent out. On disconnection (if conn_id == 0) this parameter contains disconnection reason wiced_bt_gatt_disconn_reason_t
When sending a message, core should fragment the packet to fit into the mtu.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t addr, const uint8_t *data, uint8_t len, uint16_t *p_net_key_idx)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_check_node_identity

briefdescription.para: Checks if received Service Data for Mesh Proxy Service with Node Identity corresponds to that node address.

detaileddescription.para: Application should call that function on each received advertizing with proxy service data for Mesh Proxy Service with Node Identity to check if it is came from specific node address. Example: if (NULL != (p_data = wiced_bt_ble_check_advertising_data(received_adv_data, 0x16, &len))) wiced_bt_mesh_core_check_node_identity(address, p_data, len, NULL);

parameterdescription.para: Node address to check Identity for
Received service data returned by wiced_bt_ble_check_advertising_data()
Length of the received service data.
Optional (can be NULL) pointer to variable to receive matched global network index - it is valid on success only.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t addr, const uint8_t *data, uint8_t len, uint16_t *p_net_key_idx)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_mesh_core_check_private_node_identity

briefdescription.para: Checks if received Service Data for Mesh Proxy Service with Private Node Identity corresponds to that node address.

detaileddescription.para: Application should call that function on each received advertizing with proxy service data for Mesh Proxy Service with Private Node Identity to check if it is came from specific node address.

parameterdescription.para: :Node address to check Identity for
:Received service data returned by wiced_bt_ble_check_advertising_data()
:Length of the received service data.
:Optional (can be NULL) pointer to variable to receive matched global network index - it is valid on success only.

briefdescription.para: Checks if received Service Data for Mesh Proxy Service with Private Network Identity is valid.

detaileddescription.para: Application should call that function on each received advertizing with proxy service data for Mesh Proxy Service with Private Network Identity to check if it is for a valid network.

parameterdescription.para: :Received service data returned by wiced_bt_ble_check_advertising_data()
:Length of the received service data.
:Pointer to variable to receive matched global network index - it is valid on success only.

briefdescription.para: The RPL updates from the Host.

detaileddescription.para: Application shall call this function to pass RPL updates when RPL persistant storage is on another MCU

parameterdescription.para: : opcode (see HCI_CONTROL_MESH_COMMAND_CORE_XXX in hci_control_api.h)
: data
: length of the data

simplesect.para: WICED_TRUE if opcode is recognized and handled. Otherwise caller has to call some other handler.

briefdescription.para: The signals for different test modes.

detaileddescription.para: Application shall support some test modes (for example IV update) used for certification and compliance testing. The activation of the test mode shall be carried out locally (via a HW or SW interface).

parameterdescription.para: opcode (see HCI_CONTROL_MESH_COMMAND_CORE_XXX in hci_control_api.h)
data
length of the data

simplesect.para: WICED_BT_SUCCESS if opcode is recognized and handled. Otherwise caller has to call some other handler.

briefdescription.para: Sets node identity state as a result of user interaction.

parameterdescription.para: 0: network identity, 1: node identity, 2: private network identity, 3: private node identity
1: ON, 0: OFF

briefdescription.para: Indicates the fault happened.

detaileddescription.para: Application shall call that function to indicate the fault

Identifier of a specific test to be performed
Company ID of the test
Number of faults in FaultArray
FaultArray

simplesect.para: WICED_TRUE if accepted. Otherwise returns WICED_FALSE.

briefdescription.para: Initializes provisioning layer for the node(server side).

detaileddescription.para: Called by provisioning app to initialize provisioning layer for both PB_ADV and PB_GATT.

parameterdescription.para: Private key(32 bytes) to use for ECDH authentication. It should be same if both client and server are initialized
Callback function to be called on provisioning start.
Callback function to be called on provisioning end, or error.
Callback function to be called on Capabilities get
Callback function to be called on OOB get
Callback function to send provisioning packet over GATT
Callback function to get list of provisioning records
Callback function to request fragment of the provisioning record

parameterdescription.para: Requested OOB value
Length of the requested OOB value

Capabilities of the provisioning node

briefdescription.para: Provision Local Device.

Local Device Key. If we are a provisioner, this key can be used to configure this device.
Network Key
Network Key Index
Current IV index
Key refresh phase 2 is in progress
iv_update is in progress

briefdescription.para: Set Sequence Number (SEQ) own or for RPL(Replay Protection List).

parameterdescription.para: Unicast device address. 0 means own address.
Sequence Number (SEQ). It should be <= 0x00ffffff (3 bytes length).
FALSE - it is SEQ for current IV INDEX. TRUE - for previous. If addr is 0 then it is ignored.

briefdescription.para: Removes node from RPL(Replay Protection List).

parameterdescription.para: Unicast device address to remove RPL record.

briefdescription.para: Calculates size of the memory for configuration.

simplesect.para: size of the memory for configuration

briefdescription.para: Stops proxy server advertisement and network secure beacon if they are running.
Requests collected statistics for network layer.

briefdescription.para: Requests collected statistics for transport layer.

parameterdescription.para: pointer where to copy transport layer statistics

briefdescription.para: Resets statistics of the network layer.
Resets statistics of the transport layers.
Fills buffer net_id with 8 bytes Network ID for net_key_idx.

Buffer 8 bytes length for Network ID

briefdescription.para: Encrypt or decrypts and authenticates data.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE - encrypt, FALSE - decrypt
Input data
Length of the input data
Buffer for output data. It can be same as p_in_data
Length of the buffer for output data

simplesect.para: Length of the output data. 0 on error

briefdescription.para: Set scan response raw data.

parameterdescription.para: number of scan response data element
scan response raw data

briefdescription.para: Sets Device Key request callback.

detaileddescription.para: Client application implements callback function and sets it to the core for requests for device key of the peer device. It is needed if app wants to send/receive configuration messages.

parameterdescription.para: Callback function. It can be NULL to disable callback.

briefdescription.para: Gets friend address of the LPN.

simplesect.para: Address of the friend node of the LPN. Unassigned address (0) means friendship is not established.

briefdescription.para: Set callback function to receive LPN sleep event.

parameterdescription.para: Callback function. It can be NULL to disable callback.

briefdescription.para: Set a smaller poll timeout.

detaileddescription.para: This is called by a task that requires more frequent data exchange (such as DFU).

parameterdescription.para: New poll timeout value (in 100ms).

briefdescription.para: Restore original poll timeout.

parameterdescription.para: Original poll timeout value (in 100ms).

briefdescription.para: Stops all advertisements and timers.
Deletes last element from NVRAM config.

detaileddescription.para: Application should call this function in the PTS mode to pass PTS test Node Composition Refresh Procedure MESH/SR/RPR/PDU/BV-04-C

briefdescription.para: Detects if Node Composition Refresh Procedure is needed.

detaileddescription.para: RPR Model may call this function to decide if Link Open allowed for Node Composition Refresh Procedure.

simplesect.para: WICED_TRUE if Node Composition Refresh Procedure is needed.

briefdescription.para: Resets node to unprovisioned state without restarting.

detaileddescription.para: It is quick synchronous function. Node is in the unprovisioned state on return from the function.

briefdescription.para: Returns pointer to the specific application key.

detaileddescription.para: Application may call this function to get application key by its global index. During Key Refresh procedure there are can be two application keys with same global index: old and new. Second parameter specifies which one to get.

parameterdescription.para: Global Index og the application get to get.

WICED_TRUE means the request for the updating value of the application key during Key Refresh procedure. It doesn't exist if Key Refresh procedure isn't in the progress. WICED_FALSE means the request for main application key.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the application key. On error returns NULL.

briefdescription.para: Set test events report node address.

parameterdescription.para: Address of the node being monitored, set to 0 to disable report

briefdescription.para: Sets beacon state as a result of user interaction.

parameterdescription.para: 0: Beacon, 1: Private Beacon
0: OFF, 1: ON

briefdescription.para: Sets trace level for modules of mesh_core_lib.

detaileddescription.para: Application may call this function to set trace level for modules of mesh_core_lib. By default trace level for all modules is 0(no trace). This function can be called few times to set different trace levels for different modules.

parameterdescription.para: Mask of modules of the mesh_core_lib to set trace level. It can be any combination of bits WICED_BT_MESH_CORE_TRACE_FID_XXX.
Trace level to set for modules of the mesh_core_lib. It can be any of WICED_BT_MESH_CORE_TRACE_XXX.

briefdescription.para: Gets delay statistics.

parameterdescription.para: pointer where to copy delay statistics

briefdescription.para: Resets delay statistics.
Sets intersegment delay.

parameterdescription.para: Intersegment delay in milliseconds

detaileddescription.para: Definitions for interface between Bluetooth Mesh Models and Mesh Core
